name: dishWashing_startCourse
description: This function is used to start a specific course on the dishwasher.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to start the course.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to start the course.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode or course to start on the dishwasher.
